revised_title: On the Calculation of the Coefficient of Mutual Induction Between a Circle and a Coaxial Helix and the Electromagnetic Force Between a Helical Current and a Uniform Coaxial Circular Cylindrical Current Sheet
tldr: The author calculates the coefficient of mutual induction between a circle and a coaxial helix and the electromagnetic force between a helical current and a uniform coaxial circular cylindrical current sheet, using elliptic integrals and providing examples for practical applications.
